tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE positions (
  position_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id UUID,
  timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE positions (
  position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  latitude FLOAT,
  longitude FLOAT,
  altitude FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_satellite_id FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(id)
);

CREATE TABLE positions (
  position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  altitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(satellite_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_positions (
  user_position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  position_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (position_id) REFERENCES positions(position_id)
);

CREATE TABLE positions (
    position_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE satellites_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    latitude FLOAT,
    longitude FLOAT
);
